QuestData.Title: Decryption Made Easy
QuestData.Description: We don't have the tools to decipher these encrypted plans. The Twilight's Hammer do, though.$B$BWould you take the plans back up there and run them through their one-time decryption engines?
QuestData.RewardText: Ah ha! So, that's it! They're planning on invading Uldum.$B$BWhat's worse is that the pyramid inside the Maker's Rise at Uldum can be reconfigured to become a weapon. A weapon that is capable of destroying all life on Azeroth!
